rows.THE IMAGINATION ASSET: The complete first-draft Trade. The thing that makes everything downstream possible.
WHAT IT IS
The imagination asset is the complete first-draft Trade — 688 tabs, all filled, legible enough
that a stranger can understand the opportunity, the system, and the execution plan.
It is NOT the finished product. It's the thing that makes finishing possible.
Before the imagination asset exists, you're pitching a concept.
After it exists, you're showing a machine.
A concept attracts dreamers. A machine attracts operators.
WHAT IT UNLOCKS
Audience
Expert
rows.col_2: "Can you review our strategy?" (vague, unpaid, low engagement)
rows.col_3: "Here are 16 tabs in your domain, AI-drafted. What would you fix?" (specific, valuable, high engagement)

rows.THE IMAGINATION ASSET: Venture Partner
rows.col_2: "Want to advise a supplement startup?" (commodity ask)
rows.col_3: "Here is a 688-tab operating system. Your domain cluster needs validation. Want to be the expert of record?" (unique, credible)

rows.THE IMAGINATION ASSET: Investor
rows.col_2: "We have an idea for a D2C electrolyte brand." (every pitch ever)
rows.col_3: "We have a 688-tab Trade with expert-validated models across 7 clusters, 5 funded companies using this system." (unprecedented)

rows.THE IMAGINATION ASSET: CEO Recruiter
rows.col_2: "We need a CEO for a supplement brand." (generic, low signal)
rows.col_3: "We have a funded company with a complete operating system. The CEO walks into a pre-built machine." (compelling, differentiated)

rows.THE IMAGINATION ASSET: CEO / Operator
rows.col_2: "Want to run a startup?" (risk, ambiguity, chaos)
rows.col_3: "Want to operate a pre-built business with an operating system, governance, and graduation criteria?" (structure, clarity, upside)

rows.THE IMAGINATION ASSET: WHO BUILDS IT
The Lead PM. One person. Using Claude.
They don't need domain expertise. They need:
1. Ability to have productive conversations with Claude
2. Organizational discipline to work through 41 models systematically
3. Enough taste to recognize when AI output is obviously wrong
4. Relentlessness to fill every tab with no TBDs
The Lead PM produces the imagination asset in ~4-6 weeks.
This is the single highest-leverage hire in the entire sequence after Nilo.
Everything downstream — Cluster PMs, experts, VPs, investors, CEO — depends on this existing.
